channel.title: MoparCraft.net forums
channel.description:
I'm going to split the forums once again to make a MoparCraft.net board, and it will work the same as the moparisthebest.com/moparisthebest.com split, so you will use your same user/pass, and we will have the same staff.
First, I'd like to thank tomscape beta for giving me the domain names for this, and frell for making the banner.
What I am here to ask is how you think the boards should work, right now, I've got this layout in mind:
MoparCraft:
[ul][li]Official MoparCraft Server Discussion[/li] [li]MoparCraft infraction reports[/li][/ul]
MineCraft General:
[ul][li]General minecraft discussion[/li] [li]Minecraft client modifications[/li] [li]Minecraft server modifications/plugins[/li] [li]Texture packs[/li][/ul]
Now should we have a general discussion board here as well?
Please try to give me input + reasons quickly because this is already set up and ready to go live. When it does, this board will redirect there and all these topics will be moved.

what if you make it like the moparscape client, so you can start a server.
that would be totaly awesome

item.title: MoparCraft.net forums
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:32, topic:390945”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=486896.msg3569265#msg3569265 date=1302914373]

Can you also have www.moparcraft.net redirect you to moparcraft.net/smf ?
[/quote]Well who knows what we may put there. Maybe Moparisthebest will turn the minecraft cracked client into an applet? ;D

The launcher actually loads the minecraft game like an applet. I can grab the list of required arguments if needed. This could be tied into SMF with some good scripting.[/quote]Doesn’t need to be tied into SMF at all, it could be just like the client is now

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft.net forums
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ok, I’m going to start adding boards now, like this I suppose:

General:

[ul][li]Announcements[/li]
[li]General Discussion[/li][/ul]

MoparCraft (Official Server):

[ul][li]MoparCraft Discussion[/li]
[li]MoparCraft infraction reports[/li][/ul]

MineCraft General:

[ul][li]General minecraft discussion[/li]
[li]Minecraft Tutorials[/li]
[li]Minecraft client modifications[/li]
[li]Minecraft server modifications/plugins[/li]
[li]Minecraft server advertisements (will redirect to mc status page, when I create it)[/li][/ul]

MineCraft Graphics:

[ul][li]Minecraft art/screenshots[/li]
[li]Texture packs[/li][/ul]

That about covers it I think? Thanks for all of the suggestions!

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft.net forums
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:14, topic:390945”]There’s going to be a mc server status page

And no, it’s not aimed at just the official server. From what I understand, it’s just the Mopar-hub for minecraft, with one part being the official server (just like this board is right now)[/quote]

Yes, I’m going to host a minecraft server status page using the same code as our current runescape server status page. It’s generic enough it should be easy.

And that is right as well, it will have things specific to our official server, but also be about minecraft in general.

Read full topic
